licensing: Do not copy proprietary context descriptions; author original statements.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in context README files.
safety: Reject context values containing path separators or dot-segments.

acceptance_criteria: Ensures standard subdirectories exist: design/names, planning/workplans, telemetry/work.
Creates runtime/contexts/<context>/README.md if missing (does not overwrite).
Attempts to log U.Work via telemetry/log-work under the same context.

input_fixture.description: Tools and generators for FPF Foundry.

failure_modes: Invalid context value (not a safe path segment).
Failed to create one or more context directories.
Optional telemetry logging failed (telemetry/log-work unavailable or errored).

inputs.description: Bounded context name to initialize under runtime/contexts (must be a safe path segment).
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Optional one-paragraph description for the context README.
inputs.name: description

inputs.description: Optional RoleAssignment label used when logging U.Work (default: Steward).
inputs.name: role_assignment

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related DRR ids or paths to attach to the U.Work record.
inputs.name: decisions

intent.goal: Initialize a bounded context skeleton under runtime/contexts/<context> with standard subdirectories.
non_goals: Does not create design-time context definitions under design/.
Does not infer context boundaries beyond provided description.

name: Init Context

outputs.description: Path to the initialized context root under runtime/contexts.
outputs.name: context_root

outputs.description: Path to the context README file.
outputs.name: readme_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs (context) and ensure context is a safe path segment.
Create runtime/contexts/<context> and standard subdirectories if missing.
Write runtime/contexts/<context>/README.md if missing (do not overwrite).
Log the initialization action via telemetry/log-work with method design/init-context.

summary: Initializes a bounded context skeleton under runtime/contexts to prevent directory drift.
